design.title: Critical Eye
design.description: Creating media, imagery, logos, iconography and working on web prototypes for the Critical Eye image archival website project. Critical Eye: Visual Archives for Education will provide a platform for schools and museums to use for education through the use of guides and a visual archive of user responses. My responsibilities also included providing user research, design research and branding feedback for use by the IC: Visual Labs Team.

design.title: SAM-APP for Anxiety
design.description: Using After Effects, Illustrator, Premiere Pro and Photoshop to create assets and then animate them into short videos to encourage positive mental health habits for use on the SAM-App.

design.title: Communicare
design.description: A collaboration mobile app project, creating a social media platform for use by people in care to meet and interact with others in the facility. Prototype made in Invision, documentation and client presentation made with MS Office. User Research took place including interviews of the general public to assist forming user journey maps and personas.
design.roles: User Experience Designer, User Interface Programmer, User Researcher

design.title: Flash Flask
design.description: A multimedia project involving designing an original drinking vessel, which could heat the contents up on the go. The work included working on the branding, creating 3D prototypes to then film as part of a infomercial advert and creating accompanying infographics and media to be displayed in a portfolio.

design.title: SCREEN TIME
design.description: A data visualisation project created in After Effects with assets made in Illustrator and sounds made in Ableton Live. The project aims to visualise my screentime habits over time in an engaging way through the user of a narrative.
design.roles: 2D Motion Artist, Film Editor, Sound Design

design.title: Masque
design.description: A short experimental film production shot in my house with a Note 10 Lite phone camera. Post production took place using After Effects for the VFX and Premiere Pro for the general cutting, audio was fine tuned in Audition.
design.roles: Photography, Film Editor, VFX Artist, Storyboard Designer

design.title: Bony Animations
design.description: Multiple short animations made in Maya using a bony rig, created to match the prompts 'Walkcycle' and 'push'.

design.title: LIVE FEED
design.description: A piece of Speculation design aiming to explore how the ownership of media portraying poverty might change given the creation of a system that would give control of the portrayal to those actually in poverty. A 3D interface streaming booth setup in a foodbank and an accompanying app allows those in poverty to safely present themselves to the general public through a media streaming platform
design.roles: UI Designer, Interaction Designer, User Experience Designer

development.title: Meditative tool
development.description: Using JavaScript, HTML and CSS to develop multiple short interactive animated app pages and minigames that can be used for meditation and unwinding mental fatigue.

development.title: The Burning Reef
development.description: My final project dissertation for (Bsc) Digital Media at UWE. An interactive narative driven audio-visual experience for the web, generated using Three.JS to procedurally generate in WebGL the dynamic environment. The project is an exploration into the effects of a dynamic ambience meant to demonstrate the effects of ocean degradation and elicit and emotional response from users while they explore and collect artefacts that reveal information about the causes of the degrading oceans. The aim of the project is to discover if by eliciting an emotional response, users are more willing to change their lifestyle or opinion of ocean degradation. Effectiveness of the project is measured by user research findings, which proved it to be effective at elliciting an emotional response.
development.roles: Javascript Developer, 3D Artist and User Experience Designer

development.title: DIVE
development.description: A 2D Javascript game built using the P5.JS library, using procedurally generated random tube that you travel down to collect orbs to transport to new levels.

development.title: Star Skimmer
development.description: A short endless space exploration game developed in Javascript using the P5.JS library with custom sounds and original sound track.

development.title: Rain
development.description: A short generative art animation, created using Javascript and the P5.JS library.

development.title: Carbon Visualisation
development.description: A data visualisation project created to visualise the varying carbon dioxide levels in the UK by retrieving values from a realtime API. The project also allows users to log their routine in travelling by road in order to collate all the results from all users throughout the day and see any potential correlation.

development.title: Echo Architect
development.description: An interactive game encouraging playful connections through the use of a puzzle-like interface where users must guess the code by identifying individual elements of a soundtrack. Made as an internet of Things project combining Arduino hardware for a physical interface and Javascript and ReactJS for the software interface.
development.roles: Sound Design, Visual Design, Javascript Developer

development.title: Backscatter Remover
development.description: Using Photoshop to create a dataset for a machine learning algorithm. Also, creation of accompanying documents and website that would allow submission of new images to the machine learning software.

development.title: Swerve
development.description: A data visualisation group collaboration project led by me where I pitched an idea to a panel of creatives to build a team to create the project, aiming to collect data from users of their beliefs regarding the trolley problem scenarios and collate the results as a whole.

development.title: Wordpress Blog
development.description: A look into my experience as a first year student at UWE studying Digital Media (Bsc). I document my experience as an ongoing blog and build a wordpress site to host it.
